title: Stage Lv9-P4-S20
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Life is a journey filled with unexpected turns.
He fought like a lion defending his territory.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 인생은 예상치 못한 반전으로 가득한 여행입니다.
sentences.en: Life is a journey filled with unexpected turns.

sentences.kr: 그는 자신의 영역을 지키는 사자처럼 싸웠습니다.
sentences.en: He fought like a lion defending his territory.

sentences.kr: 그녀의 목소리는 내 귀에는 음악과 같습니다.
sentences.en: Her voice is music to my ears.
Time is money, so we must use it efficiently.
The plan was structured as solid as ice.
She was shining like a star in the night sky.
Knowledge is the key that opens the future.

sentences.kr: 그의 수업은 마른 땅에 내리는 비처럼 상쾌했습니다.
sentences.en: His lecture was refreshing like rain on dry land.
